metadata.title: CVE-2019-9897 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple denial-of-service attacks that can be triggered by writing to theterminal exist in PuTTY versions before 0.71.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9897` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pterm - 0.70-6
putty - 0.70-6
putty-tools - 0.70-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: putty package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.70-6').
